About Me

I'm a client-facing professional with experience supporting accounts, coordinating programs, and managing day-to-day operations in fast-paced, service-driven environments.

My background spans account management at a market research firm working with global brands, sports operations management across multiple sites, and coaching at competitive tennis academies. I bring strengths in communication, organization, and relationship building to everything I do.

I'm currently seeking an entry-level account, project, or client success role with growth potential—somewhere I can bring my energy, learn quickly, and make an impact.

Account Coordination Client Communication Project Management Scheduling & Logistics Data Analysis Relationship Building Microsoft Office Google Workspace
